room_title: Escape room "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
review: I bought this as a gift for my son and his girlfriend. They got a couple friends together and had a blast! He said it was fun and challenging and they plan to come back to do the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
review: We did this with a group of friends. One group did the Wild West room and we did the sports locker room. The room was very challenging and forced us to definitely work together to get through it. You have to keep and open mind and think out of the box. Everything is something. Will definitely be back to try the other room. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
review: We did the locker room one and had a ton of fun. These guys put a ton of work into their rooms, I highly recommend them.
